name: The Mikasa Group, Chapter 1.
description:
When Haru and her friends are found in an old abandoned school, it is up to your survival skills to escape safely with all your friends. Find clues to what is going on, but be careful... 

The moment "She" sees you...

She will not hold back to kill you. 

This is the complete version of Chapter 1 with 3 different endings.
